results.name: Numbers == 1 (mod 4) with a unique partition as a sum of 2 squares x^2 + y^2.
comment: These numbers have exactly one representation as a sum of two triangular numbers A119345.
link: Amiram Eldar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: Select[4 * Range[0, 100] + 1, Length @ PowersRepresentations[#, 2, 2] == 1 &] (* _Amiram Eldar_, Mar 12 2020 *)
